actions.description: The anhkolox makes two Claw attacks and one Entrapping Rend attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in a horizontal direction of the anhkolox's choice.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (5d6 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be trapped in the anhkolox's rib cage and grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the anhkolox can't use Entrapping Rend on another target.
actions.name: Entrapping Rend

specialTraits.description: The anhkolox doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
